arts.ttl: Bayern Munich boss laments injury to “best player”
arts.sum: When Bayern Munich coach Vincent Kompany saw star midfielder Aleksandar Pavlović land hard on his shoulder without being able to brace himself, he knew it could be bad. Bild indicated that he would miss up to three months, which is a brutal loss for Bayern Munich, but a big setback for the developing player as well.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich star Thomas Müller “happy” with VfB Stuttgart win, looking forward to FC Barcelona match
arts.sum: Despite not registering a goal nor an assist, Bayern Munich veteran Thomas Müller was one of the most influential and impactful players on the pitch during the team’s 4-0 victory over VfB Stuttgart. Bayern fans can be happy with the win today.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane delighted Bayern Munich got back in the win column with 4-0 routing of Stuttgart
arts.sum: It took until the second half of proceedings, but a Bayern Munich side led by a Harry Kane hat-trick in the second half galloped to a 4-0 win over VfB Stuttgart at the Allianz Arena, snapping the Rekordmeister’s three-match winless streak prior to the international break. After the dominance and number of shots Bayern recorded in the first half against Stuttgart, it looked as if the match had all the hallmarks of being another frustrating night at the office, but the floodgates opened after Kane’s strike in the 57th minute broke the deadlock.

arts.ttl: When is Barcelona - Bayern Munich? how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The game between Barcelona - Bayern Munich will be played on Wednesday October 23, with kick off at 3:00 p.m. ET / 12:00 p.m. PT . What time does Barcelona - Bayern Munich start?

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany lauds Bayern Munich’s quality off the bench
arts.sum: Bayern Munich was back to winning ways after the international window, scoring four unanswered goals in an emphatic win over VfB Stuttgart, retaining its spot at the top of the table. While Kane may have started the game, Vincent Kompany’s substitutes did a good job of imposing themselves on the game as well, with Kingsley Coman going so far as to score a goal of his own, adding to the team’s tally on the night.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show: Bayern Munich 4-0 VfB Stuttgart (Bundesliga)
arts.sum: The Bavarians used three second half goals from Harry Kane and one more from Kingsley Coman to race from VfB stuttgart, who looked worn down by the Bavarians throughout the final 45 minutes. Bayern Munich fended off a frustrating first half to put forth a dominant effort in the second half to secure a 4-0 victory over visiting VfB Stuttgart in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Match awards from Bayern Munich’s 4-0 drubbing of VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: This award could have easily gone to anyone in Bayern’s backline, especially Raphaël Guerreiro, who at times looked like his sides best defender, midfielder and attacker at the same time. If you are looking for an example of why Kimmich is such an important player for Bayern, look no further than Harry Kane’s first goal.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich confirms that Aleksandar Pavlović has broken collarbone; Bild says he’ll have surgery, miss three months
arts.sum: On a play that was largely unnecessary, Bayern Munich phenom Aleksandar Pavlović has broken his collarbone per FCBayern.com . The German international suffered a broken collarbone in the top Bundesliga match against VfB Stuttgart (4:0) on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich lose Aleksandar Pavlović for Barcelona clash due to collarbone break
arts.sum: Aleksandar Pavlović will be missing for Bayern Munich’s must-watch UEFA Champions League tie with Barcelona due to a collarbone break suffered against VfB Stuttgart. The German international suffered a broken collarbone in the Bundesliga match against VfB Stuttgart on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich midfielder suffers injury ahead of Barcelona clash
arts.sum: Bayern Munich took on Stuttgart in a convincing 4-0 win on Saturday, but one man only lasted 8 minutes on the pitch, and will seemingly miss the upcoming clash against…
